name: Robo Space Attack
description:
A new Space Shooter is out there!

Battle your friend, gain items and show them all you are the best robo shooteŕ! Use Items to bear down your enemy!

Content of the readme.txt:

# This is an official FRED games AG project.
# Author: LeMas | Code: LeMas

########################
# Insall instructions: #
########################
1. Run infinijump.jar


########################
# How to play #
########################
-- Controls --
Player 1
[W] - Up
[S] - Down
[A] - Left
[D] - Right
[Q] - Shoot Left
[E] - Shoot Right

Player 2
[I] - Up
[K] - Down
[J] - Left
[L] - Right
[U] - Shoot Left
[O] - Shoot Right

-- How to play --
Kill the other Player, use the items.
